Package controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • observer.Observer
      • controller.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends Observer
    This class represents the Controller of the project, this class is in charge of the communication between the UI and the logical classes. The class uses the Observer design pattern in order to create updates and changes happening both from logical and UI interaction. The main methods of this class are the update for the observer, The initiation of the action listeners and the Thread class for running the game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Controller.PlayerMovement
      This inner class is in charge of the thread running the game.
